post:
Location: **Phoenix, AZ**
Datacenter: PhoenixNAP (IOFlood)
Virtualization: **OpenVZ**
Control Panel: SolusVM
Setup: Instant, provided you pass all fraud checks

OpenVZ 256MB
2 vCPU Cores
256MB Dedicated RAM
256MB vSwap Memory
10GB Disk Space
250GB Bandwidth
$3.50/mo (Use **3R104Q6XI7** for $0.5 off - **$3.00**)

OpenVZ 512MB
2 vCPU Cores
512MB Dedicated RAM
256MB vSwap Memory
20GB Disk Space 
250GB Bandwidth
$6.00/mo (Use **3R104Q6XI7** for $0.5 off - **$5.50**)

Promo codes **cannot** be used for Dallas Location.

CPU: E3-1240v2
Network: Gigabit
Drives: RE4 Drives in RAID10
Looking Glass: http://phoenix.lg.simpleno.de/ (test files are there too)
